title: The Reincarnated Corporate S*ave Will Not Rest Until He Becames the Strongest in the Other World - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Shounen
tags: Academy   Adventurers   Character Growth   Cheats   Childhood Friends   Demon Lord   Determined Protagonist   Elemental Magic   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Fast Learner   Game Elements   Hard-Working Protagonist   Harsh Training   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Skill Assimilation   Spirits   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Unreliable Narrator   Weak to Strong   World Travel
author: Touka Ino   丁鹿イノ
description:
Who said, “It’s stupid to train for years?”

After the male protagonist was reincarnated, his corporate slave spirit burst, and he spent all his time training day after day. He has no special abilities whatsoever, but when the day his training results paid off. He would have become a magnificent and peerless person.>
